ej,ventj001,P,herna901,Intentional HBP ej,cox-b103,M,herna901,Intentional HBP $the first pitch by Jonny Venters to Prince Fielder went over Fielder's head to the backstop; both teams were warned by HP umpire Angel Hernandez; the second pitch hit Fielder; Hernandez immediately ejected Venters and Braves manager Bobby Cox; Fielder jumped around mad; Hernandez walked over to Fielder and put his arm around Fielder's shoulders, talking to Fielder as he led Fielder to 1B; 2B umpire Rob Drake ran in to the mound and walked Venters off the field; during a game in May between these teams in Milwaukee, Ryan Braun was hit by Braves pitchers; in the game the day before this one, Braves Brian McCann had a pitch come up under his chin and Alex Gonzalez was hit; Fielder was hit in that game right after Braun had homered; Fielder had homered in his previous at bat in this game before being hit
$Prince Fielder made a very aggressive slide into 2B during the double play
35 minute rain delay at start of game
$both teams were warned by HP umpire Scott Barry after the apparent beanball war over the last two days

ej,rodri001,P,holbs901,Foul tip call (slammed bat on ground) $Rodriguez ejected by HP umpire Holbrook for arguing that catcher had dropped foul tip, making it a foul ball; umpires huddled and ruled it a cathc with drop while removing ball from glove; during argument Rodriguez slammed his bat on the ground $Ivan Rodriguez tipped the last pitch; catcher David Ross caught the ball

ej,zimmr001,P,barrs901,Throwing bat and helmet down ej,riggj801,M,barrs901,Arguing ejection of Ryan Zimmerman $Ryan Zimmerman thought strike two was out of the strike zone and started out of the batter's box to first; after he struck out, he threw his bat down and then threw his helmet down as he said something to HP umpire Scott Barry; Zimmerman was ejected by Barry; Nationals Manager Jim Riggleman came out and argued with Barry and eventually was ejected by Barry

ej,cox-b103,M,everm901,Checked swing $Eric Hinske was called out on a check swing by 3B umpire Mike Everitt; Hinske yelled as he walked back to the dugout and Braves manager Bobby Cox yelled from the dugout; Cox was ejected by Everitt and then came on the field to argue

replay,9,mccab002,ATL,mcclt901,ATL02,O,Y,I,,H $Brian McCann hit a fly ball to right that hit over the top of the barrier wall, caromed off the back wall and landed on the field; it was ruled in play but the Braves had started on the field to celebrate the victory; the umpires huddled and crew chief Tim McClelland watched the replay and overturned the call to a home run; it was the first game-ending homer reviewed
